metadata.title: CVE-2023-52161 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The Access Point functionality in eapol_auth_key_handle in eapol.c in iNetwireless daemon (IWD) before 2.14 allows attackers to gain unauthorizedaccess to a protected Wi-Fi network. An attacker can complete the EAPOLhandshake by skipping Msg2/4 and instead sending Msg4/4 with an all-zerokey.

criterions.comment: iwd package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
